import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const axios = require('axios'); class Singal_post extends React.Component{ constructor(props){ super(props) this.state={data:[],comment:{comm:"",id:""},enterComment:"'Enter Your Comment'",commentData:[]} } componentDidMount(){ let obj ={"id":""} obj.id=this.props.match.params.number; // console.log({ obj }) axios.post("http://localhost:8080/timeline/getImage",obj).then((response)=>{let data = response.data this.setState({data:data}); }); } handleSubmit=(e)=>{ e.preventDefault(); var comment = {...this.state.comment} comment.comm = this.state.enterComment; comment.id=this.props.match.params.number; this.setState({enterComment:""}) axios.post("http://localhost:8080/timeline/comment",comment).then((response)=>{let data = response.data this.setState({commentData:data.enterComment}); }) } handleChange=(e)=>{ let value = e.target.value; let name = e.target.name; this.setState({[name]:value}); } render(){ return(
